## cmdOutput() function

Executes the specified command and returns its STDOUT and STDERR outputs as a string.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function cmdOutput(options: CmdOutputOptions): string;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  options | [CmdOutputOptions](./markdown-magic-utils.cmdoutputoptions.md) | Configuration options. |

<b>Returns:</b>

string

A string containing the command output.
